providers.name: ComplyAdvantage
key_features: AI-driven fraud and AML risk detection
Monitor customer transactions for suspicious behavior
Highest level of security and risk mitigation
providers.summary: ComplyAdvantage is a subscription-based KYC provider that offers solutions for customer onboarding, transaction risk, and various use cases such as sanctions screening, adverse media screening, and fraud detection. Their key features include AI-driven fraud and AML risk detection, improved compliance workload efficiency, and reduction of false positives. They provide high-level security and support for scaling, offering better value for money.
